Description: Up for sale is a 2013 G&L USA ASAT Classic S Custom. It is in near-mint condition, with only minor surface swirls that don't show up in photographs. Without weighing it on a scale, I'm estimating that it weighs about 7.75 - 8 pounds. This guitar was a custom build-to-order, and the build sheet photograph lists all the specifications. Some of the highlights include: - Swamp ash body under a translucent orange finish.- G&L Classic pickups. - Abalone neck inlays. It includes the original G&L hardshell case in near-mint condition, as well as all paperwork. It also includes two other pickguards - tortoise shell and black - if you want to swap out the cream pickguard for a different look. TERMS: - I accept Paypal only for this item.- I do ship internationally, with some regional and country exceptions. - Shipping cost will be calculated when item is sold. So don't pay me right away. Wait for an invoice so I can calculate shipping to your location. - US and Canada: Shipping will be priced at actual cost, with no markup. - All other countries: Shipping will be priced at actual cost plus $10 USD for handling. (It's a bit of a chore to figure out the right customs forms, fill them out, and hand-carry the box to the PO.) I am a trustworthy and long-time eBayer, so purchase with confidence. Let me know if you have any questions. Thanks for looking at my listing. -Paul
Title: 2013 G&L USA ASAT Classic S Custom - Mint - With All Paperwork and OHSC
